NK085(ru)003:1: // dam tshig gsal bkra'i bsdus don gsal byed me long bzhugs so //
NK085(ru)003:3: thabs kyi theg pa spyi'i dam tshig gi mdor bsdus
NK085(ru)003:4: pa slob dpon chen po sgeg pa'i rdo rjes mdzad
NK085(ru)003:5: pa 'di la / spyi don gsum ste /
NK085(ru)003:8: zhabs dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba'o //
NK085(ru)003:11: bshad par dam bca' ba de la dang /
NK085(ru)003:12: dam tshig gi snod kyi bye brag dang sbyar ba'i dgos pa'o //
NK085(ru)003:14: gsang lam gyi sngags kyi sgor 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
NK085(ru)003:15: nang ris la la bye brag tu bstun pa'i dgos pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:16: gdul bya'i zhes blo dang 'tshams par sbyar ba'i yon tan no //
NK085(ru)003:25: nyams pa'i snga rtags tshe 'di la 'byung bar bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:26: nyams pa'i skyon phyi mar 'byung ba dang /
NK085(ru)003:28: nyams na bskang ba'i thabs dang /
NK085(ru)003:34: rtsa ba'i rtsa ba chen po rtsa ba'o //
NK085(ru)003:36: mdo dam tshig pa rnam pa'i dang /
NK085(ru)003:39: grangs sems can bstan pa'i dgos pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:43: rtsa ba'i byang sems grangs dang /
NK085(ru)003:44: thun mong spyod pa ma yin pa'i yan lag gi grangs dang /
NK085(ru)003:46: srung ba'i thabs la gsum ste /
NK085(ru)003:47: mdor bsrung bstan pa dang rgyas par bshad pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:48: srung ba'i srung ba thabs kyi man ngag phan yon dang bcas pa'i sgo nas zhabs bsdu ba'o //
NK085(ru)003:49: rgyas par dbye ba la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)003:51: yan lag gi srung thabs so //
NK085(ru)003:53: byang chub sems kyi dam tshig byas mthong dang /
NK085(ru)003:57: zhabs de dag rtsa ba bsdu ba'o //
NK085(ru)003:59: kun rang lus rdzob byang chub kyi sems dang /
NK085(ru)003:60: don dam byang chub kyi sems dang /
NK085(ru)003:61: de dag dus gsum rgyun du dang mi ldan pa'i nyes dmigs so //
NK085(ru)003:62: sku'i dam tshig la gsum ste /
NK085(ru)003:63: gang lta spyod gis srung ba'i rnal 'byor pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:65: yon tan spyod lam zhes gyi sgo nas zhabs bsdu ba'o //
NK085(ru)003:66: srung ba'i thabs la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)003:67: bsrung ba'i yul slob dpon dang /
NK085(ru)003:70: slob dpon spyi dang bsrung ba'i yul gyi grangs dang /
NK085(ru)003:71: tshul mtshon pa dpe grangs dang /
NK085(ru)003:72: srung sgo gsum ba'i thabs dang /
NK085(ru)003:74: dam tshig gi spyir bstan pa las shes par bya'o //
NK085(ru)003:75: mched kyi dam tshig la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)003:76: mched du 'brel ba'i bye brag dang /
NK085(ru)003:77: sku'i dam tshig srung thabs thun mong du bstan pa'o //
NK085(ru)003:79: mtha' yas pa byams dang snying rje'i yul du gyur pa spyi'i mched dang /
NK085(ru)003:80: sangs rgyas chos bstan pa la zhugs pa ring ba'i mched dang /
NK085(ru)003:82: su zhugs pa nye ba'i mched dang /
NK085(ru)003:83: dkyil pha gcig 'khor gcig tu zhugs pas 'dres pa'i mched dang /
NK085(ru)003:84: de dag nang tshan gis mtshon tshul dpe bstan pa'o //
NK085(ru)003:86: lus kyi sgo nas srung ba'i thabs dang /
NK085(ru)003:88: yid kyi sgo nas bsrung ba'o //
NK085(ru)003:90: mchod lus kyi sbyin gyi sgo nas mnyes par byas pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:91: zhabs gdan bting 'bring bya ba'i tshul dang /
NK085(ru)003:92: bla bla'i rig ma'i nye 'khor la yang grogs ltar byas pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:93: gnang ba nor zas med pa'i nor rdzas blang ba spangs pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:94: bla ma'i mal go sa gdan la sogs pa bag
NK085(ru)003:95: med du spyod pa'i nyes pa dang dman pa'i spyod
NK085(ru)003:96: lam lnga rtsed mor yang spang ba'o //
NK085(ru)003:97: gsung gi dam tshig la bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)003:98: sngags tsa ba bskyed dang gsum bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:99: phyag rgya dam tshig bzhi'i sgom pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:100: de dag gi rang gi sgo gsum bsgrub tshul dang /
NK085(ru)003:101: yun gyi ras kyi tshad bstan pa'o //
NK085(ru)003:102: thugs kyi dam tshig la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)003:106: spyir lta zab gsang sngags su zhugs nas gsang dgos pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:107: khyad par sgrub pa'i sgrub pa'i dus kyi gsang ba bzhi dang /
NK085(ru)003:108: gsang bar 'os pos pa'i rnam grangs mdor bsdus pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:109: gnyer gtad ces pa'i dam tshig go //
NK085(ru)003:110: gsang ba'i thabs la gsum ste /
NK085(ru)003:111: gsang sngags ba'i dgos pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:114: sgo sems nyid gsum gyi gsang ba'i thabs so //
NK085(ru)003:115: yan lag gi dam tshig srung thabs la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)003:116: khyad par gyi yan lag dang /
NK085(ru)003:117: thun mong gi yan lag go //
NK085(ru)003:119: dam thun min bca' ba'i ngos nas mdor bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:123: mi spang ba'i dam tshig dang /
NK085(ru)003:124: dang du blangs pa'i dam tshig dang /
NK085(ru)003:125: bsgrub par bya ba'i dam tshig dang /
NK085(ru)003:126: shes par bya ba lta ba'i dam tshig go //
NK085(ru)003:128: mdor sbyor sgrol bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:133: rdzun du smra ba'i dam tshig dang /
NK085(ru)003:134: ma byin par len pa'i dam tshig dang /
NK085(ru)003:135: ngag barlanga po'i dam tshig go //
NK085(ru)003:137: rang bzhin ces lta ba'i sgrol ba dang /
NK085(ru)003:138: ting nge 'dzin ces goms pa'i sgrol ba dang /
NK085(ru)003:140: yul thabs dang shes rab kyis sgrol ba dang /
NK085(ru)003:141: thabs kyis zhes ru tra sgrol ba dang //
NK085(ru)003:142: mngon phyung 'phrin las kyi sgrol ba dang /
NK085(ru)003:143: rgyud gnyis kyi dang man ngag gi lta ba gnyis
NK085(ru)003:144: shes bya yin pa'i phyir thun mong du bstan pa
NK085(ru)003:145: dang / ting nge 'dzin ces goms pas bskyed rdzogs kun gyi thun mong du bstan pa'o //
NK085(ru)003:146: mngon phyung 'phrin las kyi sgrol ba la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)003:150: rnam grangs mdor mngon phyung bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:151: de dag rgyas par bshad pa'o //
NK085(ru)003:152: de la lnga ste lta spyod gang gis sgrol ba'i rnal 'byor pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:154: bsgral ting nge 'dzin pa'i thabs dang /
NK085(ru)003:155: de'i de ltar dgos ched dang /
NK085(ru)003:156: zhar la theg pa 'og ma'i rtsod pa spang ba'o //
NK085(ru)003:158: rgyu dkon mchog las bsgrol ba bdun dang /
NK085(ru)003:159: 'bras bu las bsgral ba gsum ste spyi'i rnam grangs dang bcas pa'o //
NK085(ru)003:160: theg pa 'og ma'i rtsod pa spang ba la gsum ste /
NK085(ru)003:161: thabs kyi zhes pa spyod pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang 'go bgre ba dang /
NK085(ru)003:162: dman gyi khams dang spyod kyi dbang du mi btang ba dang /
NK085(ru)003:163: thabs thabs chen mkhas pa'i lta bas zin pa'o //
NK085(ru)003:164: sbyor ba'i dam tshig la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)003:165: mdor g+ha na bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:168: gang log par gis bya ba'i rnal 'byor pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:170: byin dbang bskur gyis brlab pa'i thabs dang /
NK085(ru)003:171: rnam dam tshig grangs kyi sgo nas sbyor ba'i phan yon bstan pa'o //
NK085(ru)003:173: rigs pad can bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:175: rdzun du smra ba'i dam tshig la bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)003:176: lta ba'i mtshan nyid rdzun gsum dang /
NK085(ru)003:177: spyod pa'i dkon mchog rdzun bzhi dang /
NK085(ru)003:179: rnam bsrung pa grangs bstan pa'i sgo nas zhabs bsdu ba'o //
NK085(ru)003:180: ma byin par len pa'i dam tshig la gsum ste /
NK085(ru)003:181: mdor zhing bcu bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:182: rgyas mtshan par bshad pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:183: rnam dam tshig gi grangs dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i sgo nas zhabs bsdu ba'o //
NK085(ru)003:184: ngag barlanga po'i dam tshig la gsum ste /
NK085(ru)003:185: tshar zhing bcu bcad pa'i tshig dang /
NK085(ru)003:186: gsang drag shul sngags spyod pa'i barlanga tshig dang /
NK085(ru)003:187: rnam ngag gi grangs kyi sgo nas zhabs bsdu ba'o //
NK085(ru)003:188: mi spang ba'i dam tshig la gsum ste /
NK085(ru)003:189: mdor mi spang bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:191: rnam de dag gi grangs dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i sgo nas zhabs bsdu ba'o //
NK085(ru)003:193: chos mthun pa yod pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i dug lnga dang /
NK085(ru)003:194: lta sgom zil gyis non pa'i phyir logs pa'i dug lnga'o //
NK085(ru)003:196: thabs bshad pa'i kyis zin pa'i 'dod chags dang /
NK085(ru)003:198: dang shes rab kyis zin pa'i zhe sdang dang /
NK085(ru)003:199: mang dor yang dag pa'i lta sgom la bzod pa thob pa'i nga rgyal dang /
NK085(ru)003:200: phyogs lta ba'i 'dzin dang bral ba'i gti mug dang /
NK085(ru)003:201: snod spyod dman dang mi ldan pa'i phrag dog go //
NK085(ru)003:202: lta bas zil gyis non pa'i dug lnga ye shes su shar ba la bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)003:203: khams log dug gsum dug lnga rang chas su ldan pa yin par bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:204: dug lnga zhes sems yin la sems ma skyees pas dug kyang ma bskyes par bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:205: de thabs mkhas ltar thabs mkhas pa'i skyes bu la
NK085(ru)003:206: ye shes lnga las ma gtogs pa'i dug lnga rang
NK085(ru)003:207: rgyud pa med par bstan pa dpe dang bcas pa
NK085(ru)003:208: dang / de de shi ba lta bur rig pa
NK085(ru)003:209: na khams gsum las ye shes ma gtogs pa'i spang
NK085(ru)003:211: dang du blang ba'i dam tshig la gsum ste /
NK085(ru)003:212: mdo dang kun gyis rgyas pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:213: rnam grangs kyi ngos nas zhabs bsdu ba'o //
NK085(ru)003:215: rdzas dri chen kyi ngo bo dang /
NK085(ru)003:216: yon grub pa tan 'byung ba'i gtan tshigs dang /
NK085(ru)003:218: ting nge 'dzin gyis zin par spyad na lam gyi mchog yon tan dpag tu med par bstan pa'o //
NK085(ru)003:219: bsgrub par bya ba la gsum ste /
NK085(ru)003:220: mdor sgrub pa bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:221: rgyas rigs lnga par dbye ba dang /
NK085(ru)003:222: rnam grangs bzhi bcu lnga kyi ngos nas zhabs bsdu ba'o //
NK085(ru)003:223: shes par bya ba'i dam tshig la gsum ste /
NK085(ru)003:224: mdor shes pa bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:226: lta ba blo la gding chud pa'i ngos nas zhabs bsdu ba'o //
NK085(ru)003:228: khams phung po lnga gsum gyi chos thams cad bsdu na grangs bdun cur 'dus pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:229: de ye shes nyid kyi don rtogs pa'i gding dang
NK085(ru)003:230: ldan na mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyang de
NK085(ru)003:231: las logs na med pas spyod yul thams cad ye
NK085(ru)003:232: shes su ka dag par bstan pa'o //
NK085(ru)003:233: thun mong gi yan lag la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)003:237: bdag don du srung ba dang /
NK085(ru)003:240: spang rgyan 'gyed bya'i skyon rnams bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:241: de spang bya las bzlog pa'i yon tan bstan pa'o //
NK085(ru)003:242: gzhan don du sbyor ba la gnyis pha rol phyin drug te /
NK085(ru)003:243: thugs rje'i spyod pa'i ngos nas gzhan don du nyams su blang ba dang /
NK085(ru)003:244: rnam bzhi bcu grangs kyis ngos nas gdul bya mi spang bar gdams pa'o //
NK085(ru)003:245: spyi don bzhi pa dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu bstan pa la gsum ste /
NK085(ru)003:247: nyams mi chos slob dpon rgyu'i rnam grangs rgyas par bshad pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:248: ma spangs nyi shu nyams na nyams par 'gyur ba'o //
NK085(ru)003:249: spyi don lnga pa nyams pa'i rgyu bstan pa la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)003:252: nyams zhes pa'i skyon tshe 'di las 'byung bar phyi mar ngan song du 'gro ba'i snga rtags dang /
NK085(ru)003:253: nyams gal te nyams na rtags med kyang /
NK085(ru)003:254: phyi mar sdug bsngal tshab che bas sdug bsngal yun ring bar bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:255: ma nyams gal lte nyams par rtags byung na tshe
NK085(ru)003:256: snga ma phan chad kyi rnam smin rtsub mo stobs
NK085(ru)003:257: che bas 'dir bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs
NK085(ru)003:258: kyis zad nas slar bskang gso la btson par byas
NK085(ru)003:259: na phyin chad ngan song mi myong bar bstan pa'o
NK085(ru)003:260: // spyi don drug pa nyams pa'i skyon bstan pa la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)003:264: rtsa ba nyams pa'i skyon dang /
NK085(ru)003:265: yan lag nyams pa'i skyon no //
NK085(ru)003:267: bye brag nyams pa'i skyon dang /
NK085(ru)003:270: byang sems zhes dam tshig nyams pa'i skyon dang /
NK085(ru)003:273: thugs zhes kyi dam tshig nyams pa'i skyon no //
NK085(ru)003:274: spyir nyams pa la lnga ste /
NK085(ru)003:276: rdo rje dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshad dang /
NK085(ru)003:277: sngar sangs rgyas stong nyams pa'i dbang gis thugs rje'i stobs med pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:278: rdo rje dmyal bkal ba bar gnas pa'i yun dang /
NK085(ru)003:279: de de bas ltar nyes che bas bsrung ba la nan tan bya bar gdams pa'o //
NK085(ru)003:280: yan lag nyams pa'i skyon la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)003:283: spyi don bdun pa ma nyams yon tan la gsum ste /
NK085(ru)003:286: theg chen theg pa gsum gyi sdom pa thams cad
NK085(ru)003:287: 'di'i yan lag tu 'dus pas phan yon dang bcas
NK085(ru)003:288: par bstan pa'o // rgyas pa la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)003:290: yan lag gi yan lag yon tan no //
NK085(ru)003:292: byang chub kyi lus nad nyung dam tshig dang /
NK085(ru)003:293: sku'i dam tshig yon tan thun mong du bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)003:294: gsung zhes gi yon tan dang /
NK085(ru)003:295: thugs zhes kyi yon tan no //
NK085(ru)003:296: spyi don brgyad pa nyams na bskang ba'i thabs la gsum ste /
NK085(ru)003:299: bskangs pa'i de ltar nyams su yon tan gyi sgo nas zhabs bsdu ba'o //
NK085(ru)003:303: yan lag gi bskang thabs so //
NK085(ru)003:304: rtsa ba'i bskang thabs la bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)003:305: byang chub sems kyi zhes bskang thabs dang /
NK085(ru)003:307: gsung gi zhes bskang thabs dang /
NK085(ru)003:308: thugs kyi zhes bskang thabs so //
NK085(ru)003:309: sku'i bskang thabs la lnga ste /
NK085(ru)003:310: bskangs thabs dngos sku yi dang /
NK085(ru)003:311: yul de med na de'i slob dpon la bskang ba'i thabs gal te dang /
NK085(ru)003:312: de yang med na mnyam pa brgya la mchod sbyin gyis bskang ba med na dang /
NK085(ru)003:313: brgya ma rnyed na mnyam pa gsum la sbyin sreg gis bskang de yang ba dang /
NK085(ru)003:314: zhar la bshags pa'i yul dngos kyis kyang myur du
NK085(ru)003:315: tshangs par ma byas pa'i nyes dmigs bstan gal te
NK085(ru)003:316: pa'o // spyi don dgu pa mtshon pa dpe la gsum ste /
NK085(ru)003:320: rgyas pa la bcu gcig ste /
NK085(ru)003:321: yon tan thams cad kyi gzhi dam tshig gis bzung ba'i dpe sa gzhi dang /
NK085(ru)003:322: bsrung thub ma thub kyis legs nyes gang du gyur pa'i dpe so mtshams dang /
NK085(ru)003:323: bsrungs ba'i yon tan lam 'bras bu'i dgos pa skong ba'i dpe rin chen dang /
NK085(ru)003:324: chos thams cad dam tshig tu 'dus pa'i dpe nam mkha' dang /
NK085(ru)003:325: bsrungs na 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis 'ching ba gcod pa'i dpe rno dbal dang /
NK085(ru)003:326: dus gsum rgyal ba dam tshig las 'byung ba'i dpe pha mas dang /
NK085(ru)003:327: bsrung na dngos grub kyi byin rlabs 'byung ba'i dpe rgya mtsho dang /
NK085(ru)003:328: khyad du mi gsad cing bag dang ldan pa'i dpe me dpung dang /
NK085(ru)003:329: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sel ba'i dpe de bzhin dang /
NK085(ru)003:330: dam tshig dang ldan pa'i bya ba thams cad chud mi zad pa'i dpe rgyal po dang /
NK085(ru)003:331: dang po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas mthar
NK085(ru)003:332: mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du
NK085(ru)003:333: skad cig tsam yang 'bral mi rung ba'i rgya mtsho'i
NK085(ru)003:334: nor dape'o // spyi don bcu pa mdo bzhi'i brjod bya'i zhabs bsdu ba la bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)003:336: shes bya lta ba'i mdo rang bzhin dang /
NK085(ru)003:337: goms byed ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo de don dang /
NK085(ru)003:338: blang dor med pa spyod pa'i mado'o //
NK085(ru)003:340: ces dam tshig rang bzhin dang /
NK085(ru)003:341: chos ji snyed thams cad kyi rang bzhin bstan pa
NK085(ru)003:342: dang dus thams ci snang cad du de las 'da'
NK085(ru)003:344: spyod pa'i mdo la gsum ste /
NK085(ru)003:345: spyod pa'i ngo bo 'di la dang /
NK085(ru)003:346: nyes par mi 'gyur ba'i gtan tshigs ma bshags dang /
NK085(ru)003:347: dpe'i khyad par gyis dam tshig bzhi'i zhabs bsdu sgyu 'phrul ba'o //
NK085(ru)003:348: dam tshig rdo rje gsal bkra'i bsdus don gsal byed
NK085(ru)003:349: me long zhe bya ba bla ma rin po che
